amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Economic Research Service by $3 million and increases funding for the Summer Electronic Benefit Transfer for Children program by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Economic Research Service by $3 million and to increase funding for Child Nutrition Programs by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Cohen.
